title: #220: A Behavioural Analysis of Prince Andrew - Forensically Deconstructing Jeffrey Epstein Part 12
description:
Laura and Jim discuss and share their behavioural analysis and insights with Lisa of Prince Andrew's interview with BBC2 Newsnight's Emily Maitlis, which aired on November 16 2019.
